code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate,useSearchParams}from'react-router-dom';import ItemCard from'../shared/ItemCard';import modelsData from'../models/models.json';import Pagination from'../../components/pagination/Pagination';import'./SkuSearch.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkuSearchResults=_ref=>{let{onSelectModel}=_ref;const[searchParams]=useSearchParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const sku=searchParams.get('sku')||'';const filteredModels=modelsData.models.filter(model=>model.sku&&typeof model.sku==='string'&&model.sku.toLowerCase().includes(sku.toLowerCase())||model.name&&typeof model.name==='string'&&model.name.toLowerCase().includes(sku.toLowerCase()));const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState(1);const modelsPerPage=12;const totalPages=Math.ceil(filteredModels.length/modelsPerPage);const displayedModels=filteredModels.slice((currentPage-1)*modelsPerPage,currentPage*modelsPerPage);if(filteredModels.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["No models found for: ",sku]});}const handleSelectModel=selectedModel=>{navigate("/?tab=alternative&model=".concat(selectedModel.id));onSelectModel(selectedModel);};const handlePageChange=page=>{setCurrentPage(page);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid mb-5 mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Your search: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:sku})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row d-flex flex-wrap p-2",children:displayedModels.map(model=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ItemCard,{item:model,onSelect:()=>handleSelectModel(model)},model.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{currentPage:currentPage,totalPages:totalPages,onPageChange:handlePageChange})]});};export default SkuSearchResults;
